abstract: Federal jury finds city of White Plains, NY, and Police Officer Anthony Carelli not at fault in wrongful-death lawsuit brought by family of Kenneth Chamberlain Sr, who was killed during confrontation with police in 2011.
lead_paragraph: A federal jury rejected a wrongful-death claim by the family of Kenneth Chamberlain Sr., a mentally disturbed ex-Marine killed in his apartment.
snippet: A federal jury rejected a wrongful-death claim by the family of Kenneth Chamberlain Sr., a mentally disturbed ex-Marine killed in his apartment....

headline.main: White Plains Police Cleared in Suit Over 2011 Shooting Death
headline.print_headline: White Plains Police Cleared in Suit Over Shooting of Disturbed Man in 2011
